pages.text: When crafting the unlit focus, it is $(l)very important$() that you pick the bottom middle ingredient carefully. Different ingredients imbue the focus with different innate spellcasting attributes; pick one that suits your magical playstyle! Some possible ingredients don't do anything at all, and some even provide negative effects! See the next page for details.

$(li)$(l:amethyst_imbuement:gems/tigers_eye)Tigers Eye$(): +15% Knockback Resistance$(li)$(l:amethyst_imbuement:gems/energetic_opal)Energetic Opal$(): +3% Movement Speed$(li)$(l:amethyst_imbuement:gems/glowing_fragment)Glowing Fragment$(): -3% Spell Mana Cost$(li)$(l:amethyst_imbuement:gems/brilliant_diamond)Brilliant Diamond$(): -7.5% Spell Mana Cost$(li)$(l:amethyst_imbuement:gems/accursed_figurine)Accursed Figurine$(): +10% Damage Taken (This is a negative attribute, the holder takes the additional damage)$(li)$(l:amethyst_imbuement:gems/malachite_figurine)Malachite Figurine$(): +7.5% Spell Effect Duration

$(li)$(l:amethyst_imbuement:recipes/resonant_rod)Resonant Rod$(): +5% Spell Damage$(li)$(l:amethyst_imbuement:gems/heartstone)Heartstone$(): +1 Spell Effect Amplifier$(li)$(l:amethyst_imbuement:gems/lustrous_sphere)Lustrous Sphere$(): +7.5% Spell Level$(li)$(l:amethyst_imbuement:imbuing/knowledge_powder)Knowledge Powder$(): +5% Player Experience Gain$(li)$(l:amethyst_imbuement:recipes/recipes#golden_heart)Golden Heart$(): +12.5% Spell Range and AOE$(li)$(l:amethyst_imbuement:trinkets/copper_jewelry#copper_ward_recipe)Copper Ward$(): +2.5% Shielding Chance$(li)$(l:amethyst_imbuement:trinkets/imbued_jewelry)Steel Ward$(): +1.25 Armor
